name: Snake Warriors: Training
description:
Choose from nine characters and start your career as a Snake Master in Snake Warriors: Training. Show your talent as a driver at the race tracks in Snake Race and demonstrate your patience and skill in avoiding hitting your own body in Classic Training. But are you sure you can also do this in the dark in Night Training?

If you possess all these skills, then show you have an excellent memory in the Snake Memory game, but beware: in some levels you will even need to combine all your talents with numerical skills. If you turn out to be good at all these games and you have also mastered picking up moving items in Hunting Targets, you will be heading for a successful career in which you can unlock many pieces of clothing for your snake as well as medals throughout the 75 levels.

Specifications: - 75 levels
- 5 games
- 9 characters
- 3 save slots
